name: latencymon
description: Monitor and compare latencies measured from [RIPE Atlas](https://atlas.ripe.net) in realtime.

scripts.examples:
([ -d "dist" ] && http-server examples) || echo "Error. No build in /dist found.
Use \"npm run build\"." && exit 1
scripts.test:
([ -d "dist" ] && http-server test) || echo "Error. No build in /dist found.
Use \"npm run build\"." && exit 1

author: see ./AUTHORS
